pros: The school mission and the dedication of the management and staff was motivational.
cons: Financial dependence on US Department of Education for student loans and grants.

review_title: this is a company in which you have the opportunity to work , and to take a check back to home bi-weekly ,It is not real
pros: The wage for instructors, isn't all evil, even if below most of the local schools, they offer retirement plans and health insurance and two weeks of vacation after the second year
cons:
 



There is no sufficient training to the instructors, they assume that one has to know everything, with reference to procedures, degrees, etc also office paperwork management is not appropriate and in order to achieve an increment of salary you have to be very good friend with the directors of the campus.

review_title: A Phenomenal fast-paced environment with great opportunities
pros: A phenomenal fast-paced environment with tons of opportunities to grow and move up. Strong leadership for all senior management and great 'family' sense amongst the large employee body across Florida.
cons: Grows so quickly you need to play catch up. Sometimes the work will ramp up and bleed into your personal life.

pros: The coworker and environment was very good.
cons: The checks rebounds, they still own me my last pay stub. They lie to the students in order to get them into the programs, the place is dirty because they do not pay for garbage pick up and they do not have enough maintenance personnel. The place is a mess.

job_title: Corporate Director in Coral Gables, FL
pros: One of the best companies I have worked for. The best Executive Team
cons: Commute over 1 hour each way. From Fort Lauderdale to Coral Gables. Traffic is Horrible!!
Previous leadership, hours (split shifts), Limited PTO time, later hours, 12 hour clinical

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Coral Gables, FL

pros: Some good co-workers. Classrooms are well equiped for teaching. High quality professionals, must of them former physicians in their countries.
cons: Corporate mafia, salary reduction, bad community reputation, micromanagement, gossip. Dade Medical College will harm your resume.

pros: There was a strong family working environment and in the beginning, it felt as if you were helping someone get ahead in life.
cons: Company and its managers were not consistent with spending or decisions and company closed unexpectedly due to bad planning.

job_title: Director of Nursing in Hollywood, FL
pros: The pay was good, however no other pros to mention.
cons: The company did not care about the students, or staff. They only cared about money to be made off of the students.
